body: @AnimeFanatic11 NO, the lie is with her for being aggressive af. Men don't want to deal with that shit. And guess what, the friends were partly right, because she had just accused THE WRONG GUY IN PUBLIC.

This is probably my first long salty comment in this site, sorry in advance i guess... I'm pretty neutral when it comes to this type of doujins normally, but this time it crosses the line for me, a ntr rape fantasy thar blurs to realism, because the girl admits to rape and is not taken seriously by her friends... Out of all of the bloody and filthy doujins i've read on this site its the first time i felt genuinely disgusted/disturbed.
@AnimeFanatic11 again, what's the name of the manga? Im interested

@A_Certain It’s called “Zutto Suki Datta“ and it was the female friend who liked the heroine not guy. Really weird story..
@Nat123 True, Tsunderes always get into deep sh*t. I remember a Time-Traveling Manga with the Heroine getting raped in the future. Yet somehow it’s all the MC fault when it’s hers for not being honest. So I understand your POV

ho ho ho Santa is real

Real talk tho. 1. Her friends didn’t take her serious or give a sh*t. You think those are Crocodile tears? That’s how society is sadly. No one takes rape seriously.
2.The mother probably knew something.
3. It seems she’s newly acquainted with her friends. She didn’t drink till she was coaxed by them.
4.The BIGGEST fault lies with the guy. Being hot-headed and dense. Not taking her seriously and thinking it’s just another ‘Fight’. I love Hot-Headed MCs, like Psyren but most of the time they’re retarded and indecisive!
I can only hope a happy ending with him. This reminds me of another NTR Hentai where she gets pregnant with the coach. However he gets sentenced to jail and years later the guy realizes what happens. He still takes her in as a wife. It’s weirdly sad, dunno if he’s a simp or not cause clearly other friend liked him too..
Sigh, this story will be godly good if takeshiba goes back to the storage room to save Andou. Then Andou's mother will realize and change her personality. damn.
I wish this doujin get the sequel, this is nice one
No matter what anyone says, this is a good doujin 👍

Most of the time I don't really put reality together with these kind of mangas, but this was so heartbreaking I started crying in the middle of it. To think that there are people out there who actually do this kind of stuff is making me so damn angry.
